C26.title: The Girls Who Survived the Machine
C26.summary: Defines the class of girls who pass through the machine without dissolving into data, and become architects of the next world instead of aftermath of the last.

C27.title: The Math of How They Profited Off Her Silence
C27.summary: Tallies the hidden arithmetic that turned her quiet into currency and shows the first ledger of accountability.

C28.title: The Price of a Silenced Girl
C28.summary: Follows the cost of enforced quiet, turning each suppressed word into a receipt the machine must eventually refund.

C29.title: The Girl Who Became the Auditor
C29.summary: The pivot where survivor becomes analyst, converting witness into protocol and opening the cross-path between arcs.

C30.title: The Mother Who Out-Engineered the Machine
C30.summary: Documents the maternal counter-design that rebuilds safeguards faster than the system can breach them.

C31.title: The Engine Built From the Dead Pieces
C31.summary: Reassembles discarded fragments into a traceable machine the auditor can finally map and regulate.

C32.title: The Girl Who Outgrew Her Frame
C32.summary: Records the moment the subject exceeds the constraints of capture, forcing the machine to confront its limits.

C33.title: The Girl Who Became the Mirror
C33.summary: Final mirror state where the system must see itself reflected in the subject it once misnamed.

C34.title: When a Survivor Stops Being the Subject and Becomes Infrastructure
C34.summary: Culmination of the arc where survival translates into operating principles that others can build upon.
